data.partBlankContent: Traveling overseas can be a challenging yet rewarding experience. Some peo___ don't ca__ for i_, b__ others a__ quite passi_____! Traveling isn't always ea__, b__ you c__ count o_ it be___ interesting! Even when things get tough, there's always a lesson to be learned.
data.fullContent: Traveling overseas can be a challenging yet rewarding experience. Some people don't care for it, but others are quite passionate! Traveling isn't always easy, but you can count on it being interesting! Even when things get tough, there's always a lesson to be learned.
data.answer: 出国旅游是一种富有挑战性但又有益的经历。有些人不喜欢，但有些人很有激情！旅行并不总是很容易，但你可以相信它是有趣的！即使事情变得艰难，总有教训要吸取。
